channel.title: pretty Easy privacy (p≡p)
channel.description:
pretty Easy privacy (p≡p) looks conceptually really cool.
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/E-Mail#pretty_Easy_privacy
Just watched the p=p ccc talk (was in German).
Is it already available?
//cc @HulaHoop (who wrote that wiki entry)

item.title: pretty Easy privacy (p≡p)
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
There is an Android client already released on F-Droid. Enigmail and GNUnet integration is a WIP.

Edit:

found more details: The Enigmail and GNUnet work is planned for release this year.

https://prettyeasyprivacy.com/faq/
https://pep.foundation/pep-software/index.html

Read full topic
